meanings.definition: A person who reverts to a previous state or condition.
meanings.sent1: The reverters in the group preferred traditional methods.
meanings.sent2: The team of reverters decided to go back to the old system.
meanings.sent3: The reverters at the party kept talking about 'the good old days'.
meanings.sent4: She was a true reverter, always looking back instead of forward.
meanings.sent5: The reverters in the town were known for their nostalgia.

meanings.sent1: The reverters gathered to discuss their shared interests.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to various reverters.
meanings.sent3: The reverters on the shelf seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sound of pages turning as the reverters read.
meanings.sent5: The reverters on the book cover looked like they were having a party.
